snippet.title: LURKS WITHIN WALLS | Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the oppressive, dark corridors of LURKS WITHIN WALLS, where exploration feels as suffocating as the walls that seem to close in around you. Each step through these cursed environments brings an overwhelming sense of dread, as flickering lights and faint whispers warn of horrors lurking just out of sight.

The game is a unique approach to survival horror with a strategic twist. Armed with limited resources, the turn-based combat demands careful planning. Every move matters as you face grotesque creatures brought to life from Trevor Henderson's haunting imagination.

Get ready to immerse yourself in an unforgettable blend of strategy, atmosphere, and fear. Try the demo now on Steam and wishlist to stay updated!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3197890/LURKS_WITHIN_WALLS/
